title: Westmarket
description: The newest web serial from M. Jones, the author of Gangster: Everyone has their own brand of crazy. Underemployed Dan tries to hold it all together during a zombie apocalypse with his best friend and pothead Evan, while lovestruck Matthew can't seem to figure out what Charlie wants. One thing they can all agree on--being trapped in a Westmarket store with hungry undead hordes outside and a sociopathic murderer inside is no way to spend their last days on Earth.WESTMARKET is now available at Amazon.com
author: M.  Jones
